name: SPIE--2018 10th International Conference on Graphics and Image Processing (ICGIP 2018)--Scopus, Ei Compendex
content: ★Paper Publication★ The paper accepted by ICGIP 2018 will be published in conference proceedings in the SPIE Digital Library along with nearly 300,000 papers from other outstanding conferences and articles from SPIE Journals, which will be included in the SPIE Digital Library, and provided to the Web of Science (CPCI), \*Scopus, Ei Compendex\*, Inspec, Google Scholar, Microsoft Academic Search, and others, to ensure maximum awareness of the Proceedings. \*ICGIP has very credible publication index records at Ei Compendex, Scopus, and Web of Science.
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
